mapper.insert: insert into group_info (group_name, phone_no,is_accredit_visible,accredit_startTime,accredit_endTime,accredit_weeks, create_time) values (#{groupName}, #{phoneNo},#{isAccreditVisible},#{accreditStartTime},#{accreditEndTime},#{accreditWeeks}, now())
mapper.select: select id groupId,group_name groupName,is_accredit_visible isAccreditVisible,accredit_startTime accreditStartTime, accredit_endTime accreditEndTime,accredit_weeks accreditWeeks from group_info where id = #{groupId}
mapper.update: update group_info set group_name = #{groupName},is_accredit_visible = #{isAccreditVisible},accredit_startTime = #{accreditStartTime}, accredit_endTime = #{accreditEndTime},accredit_weeks = #{accreditWeeks} where id = #{groupId}
mapper.select: select id groupId,group_name groupName from group_info where phone_no=#{phoneNo} order by create_time asc
